# Software {-#software}

We conducted the analysis with R, version 4.0.3. All models were developed with the R package `rstanarm` and visualizations were created with `ggplot2`. Each section of the report is an Rmarkdown document, which we combined with `bookdown` to create the full report. The code for the Rmarkdown files is available at:  . No data accompanies the code due to student privacy protections.
